body.name: Honestly pHresh Natural Prebiotic & Probiotic Foaming Feminine Wash, pH Balanced with Essential Minerals, Safe for Sensitive Skin, 24 Hour Odor Protection, 5 Oz, Rose Bergamot
features: NATURAL PRE & PROBIOTICS: Fight feminine odor and irritation with our pH balanced daily cleanser, made with natural pre & pro biotics to help restore healthy bacteria.

NO IRRITATION: Our washes are formulated naturally using a balance of minerals and essential oils that work in harmony to effectively keep you pHresh and pH balanced throughout the day without irritation. Safe for all skin types

VAGINOME SAFE: It's time for something that is good for your health and the environment. With a gentle foaming cleanser that's, moisturizing, pH balanced with an odor blocker, you'll be able to feel clean and confident all day long
24 HOUR ODOR GUARD: If you want to feel fresh and confident, we have the perfect product for you! These feminine washes are gentle, and leave your skin feeling moisturized.

CRUELTY-FREE, VEGAN, AND MADE IN THE USA: We love animals! Our products are cruelty-free and we never use animal derivatives in our products. We only use vegan friendly ingredients so you can feel free to break a sweat without the guilt!
body.description: At Honestly pHresh we make all-natural deodorants that are free from toxic chemicals and other harmful ingredients. Our products are safe and effective, providing unsurpassed odor and wetness protection. Honestly pHresh all-natural deodorant does everything traditional antiperspirants do, but better. As it turns out, sweat is actually odorless. What causes the smell we refer to as B.O. is actually the bacteria on our skin combining with and breaking down our sweat. Honestly pHresh’s unique formula features powerful minerals & a prebiotic that virtually eliminate odor-causing bacteria, while natural moisture-absorbers work quickly to keep us dry. Our 100% natural deodorants are long-lasting, pHresh-smelling, skin-soothing, cruelty-free and vegan, and contain absolutely no aluminum, parabens, phthalates, petroleum, glycol, gluten, GMOs, or synthetic fragrances. So go ahead—break a sweat. Healthy looks good on you. 100% Free Of: Aluminum Parabens Phthalates Glycol Petrochemicals Formaldehyde Sodium Laureth Sulfate Sodium Lauryl Sulfate Mineral Oils (Silicones) Monoethanolamine (MEA) Diethanolamine (DEA) Triethanolamine (TEA) Synthetic Fragrances Animal Testing Artificial Colors Carbomer Gluten GMOs Talc
